alert.note: Alert for Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 5:22AM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
